channel.title: Uke Along Artist » Voices Of Christmas

item.title: Voices Of Christmas - All I Want For Christmas Is You - Key of G
item.description:
Ukulele play along
All I Want For Christmas Is You - Mariah Carey
Using the chords: Am7 B7 C Cm D7 Em E7 G
Suggested Strum Patterns: D DU D DU or D DU U DU
This video is meant for educational purposes.
No copyright infringement intended

item.title: Voices Of Christmas - All I Want For Christmas Is You - Key of G
item.description:

CHORDS USED: G, B7, Em, Cm, E7, Am7, C, D
Strum On!
